associate.name: FÃ¶reningen fri kultur och programvara (Society for Free Culture and Software)

description.p: The Society for Free Culture and Software is a Swedish non-profit organisation working for a society built around a free exchange of knowledge, ideas and culture. The society works inter-disciplinary and gathers knowledge at the conference FSCONS from several different groups, including Creative Commons, Free Software Foundation Europe, Wikimedia, FriBit and EFN.
